resources.string: Lets watch the video to learn, then click play!

string-array.name: subtitle_detail_text
string-array.item: Please watch the video that will teach you about the clock! If you want to play the game without watching the video, you can press the PLAY button :)
Please watch the video that will teach you about the seasons! If you want to play the game without watching the video, you can press the PLAY button :)
Please watch the video that will teach you about the days of the week! If you want to play the game without watching the video, you can press the PLAY button :)
Please watch the video that will teach you about the months! If you want to play the game without watching the video, you can press the PLAY button :)
Please watch the video that will teach you about the digits! If you want to play the game without watching the video, you can press the PLAY button :)
Please watch the video that will teach you about the spelling bee! If you want to play the game without watching the video, you can press the PLAY button :)
Please watch the video that will teach you about the directions! If you want to play the game without watching the video, you can press the PLAY button :)
Please watch the video that will teach you about the multiplication! If you want to play the game without watching the video, you can press the PLAY button :)
You have to find the similar pictures! If you want to play the game, you can press the PLAY button :)
You have to follow the ball with your eyes! If you want to play the game, you can press the PLAY button :)

string-array.name: games_info
string-array.item: Welcome to the Days of the Week Game!
Welcome to the Spelling Bee Game!
Welcome to the Learning the Directions Game!
Welcome to the Similar Pictures Game!
Welcome to the Follow the Ball Game!
